data.title: Yearly & Monthly weather
data.meta_description: Freiburg, Germany - Climate and weather forecast by month. Detailed climate information with charts - average monthly weather with temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, wind, daylight, sunshine, visibility, and UV index data. The month with the most rainfall in Freiburg, Germany, is June, when the rain falls for 13.3 days and typically aggregates up to 36mm (1.42") of precipitation. The month with the longest days in Freiburg, Germany, is June, with an average of 16h and 0min of daylight.
data.text:
Average temperature

Freiburg, Germany

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is August (23.3째C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (3째C).

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (12.3째C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is February (-2.1째C).

Average snowfall

Freiburg, Germany

The month with the highest snowfall is January (26mm).

The months with the least snowfall are May, June, July, August, September and October (0mm).

Average snowfall days

Freiburg, Germany

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (4.9 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July, August, September and October (0 days).

Average daylight / Average sunshine

Freiburg, Germany

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 16h and 0min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 8h and 30min).

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 10h and 12min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 4h and 24min).

Average UV index

Freiburg, Germany

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 5).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, February, October, November and December (UV index 2).

Average visibility

Freiburg, Germany

The months with the highest visibility are March, April, July and August (9km).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, February, May, June, September, October, November and December (8km).
